name: Data Table Spread
description: Full-width or near-full-width DataTable layout for presenting dense tabular data with zebra striping, condensed grid, and clear header hierarchy for print readability.
components: Table title: $heading-04 above the table with $spacing-05 gap
Data cells: $body-short-01 for compact row content
Optional source note: $label-02 in $text-05 below the table
Optional row highlight: $blue-10 background for featured rows
rules: Use condensed grid (1px gutters) for dense data — never wide grid for tables
Zebra striping alternates $ui-01 and $ui-background for row readability
Maximum 8 visible columns — more than 8 causes truncation in A4 portrait; split into multiple tables if needed
Column headers use $label-01 bold weight on $ui-03 background for clear hierarchy
Data cells use $body-short-01 (14px) — never $body-long variants which waste vertical space
Table must have a title ($heading-04) and optional source note ($label-02) for context
Numeric columns right-align; text columns left-align; use monospace ($code-01) for precise values
Prefer colSpan 16 for tables with 6+ columns; use colSpan 14 offset 1 for narrower tables (3-5 columns)
antiPatterns: Never use wide grid gutters (32px) for tables — condensed (1px) is required for data density
Never exceed 8 visible columns — split into multiple tables or use a secondary detail view
Never omit zebra striping on tables with 5+ rows — unstriped tables cause row-tracking errors
Never use $body-long-01 for table cells — the line height wastes vertical space in dense layouts
Never place two full-width data tables on consecutive pages without intervening narrative content
